short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New tab displays multiple cities, timezones, weather and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replaces new tab with a dashboard featuring multiple cities (city name, image, current time and weather). Additional features include inspirational quote and optional network speed test.
Particularly useful for families, co-workers living and/or working across the globe.
